name: ScuffedSouls
description:
This is an action medival based games where you will test your skills againts various opponents and fight through the level. As you progress it will get harder and harder untill you get to the boss and slay it.

Input scheme

W- forward

D- right

A- left

S- backwards

SPACE- dodge

SHIFT - run

LMB- attack

RMB - block/ parry
